numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a significant estimated legacy boost for richer parents.
2. I wonder what the main cause is.
3. Some students are not admitted to major league colleges.
6. My older sister attends the University of Pennsylvania.
7. The University of Pennsylvania is an Ivy League school.
8. The graph is relatable to me.
9. My older sister excelled in high school.
10. My older sister had multiple extracurricular activities.
11. If my older sister did not excel in high school then my older sister would have to pay 50000 USD.
12. If my older sister did not have multiple extracurricular activities then my older sister would have to pay 50000 USD.
13. My older sister had almost all costs covered.
14. Now my older sister has to pay around 2000 USD.
15. I petition to abolish college tuition.
